content: While everyone is responsible for their own actions and decisions, it's important to remember that phishing attacks can affect not just the individuals who fall for them, but also their friends, family, and colleagues. Victims of scams can suffer significant financial loss, identity theft, and reputational damage. By educating ourselves and raising awareness about these scams, we can help prevent them from happening and protect ourselves and others from falling prey to these attacks. We should work together to create a safer digital environment, and show empathy towards those who have fallen victim to these scams.
